Ref: CXP085/2024

Criteria:

  • Matric plus Relevant Degree in B.Comm Supply Chain / B.Tech degree
    or Advanced Diploma in Engineering or Materials Technology
  • 7 years’ supply chain management / account executive experience in
    the Metals / Recycling or related sector
  • 7 years experience in financial analysis, budgeting and reporting.
  • Business automation experience and SAP proficiency is preferred
  • Knowledge of different metals / commodities across different
    industries and their applications (automotive or related industry).
  • Sound knowledge of sales operations, new business development and
    negotiations & management of technical key accounts.

Apply via website or alternatively via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
